If $\Diamond4_7=\Diamond1_{8}$ and $\Diamond$ represents a digit, solve for $\Diamond$.
inference:
$\Diamond4_7=\Diamond1_{8}$
$\Rightarrow 4\cdot 10+\Diamond=1\cdot 10+\Diamond$
$\Rightarrow 40+\Diamond=10+\Diamond$
$\Rightarrow 40-10=\Diamond-\Diamond$
$\Rightarrow 30=0$
$\Rightarrow \Diamond=\boxed{?}$
Final Answer: $\boxed{?}$. I hope it is correct.
